attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it absolutely disgraceful that teacher Gillian Gibbons has been jailed for naming a teddy Mohammed.  

The whole idea of it is just ridiculous and I think the British Government should step in here and big her home straight away.

In the news today, it has shown thousands of people marching in Khartoum calling for British teacher to be executed.

Protesters took to the streets carrying knives and sticks, chanting "shame on the UK" and "kill her by firing squad".

Who do these people think they are, and why do they think it is perfectly okay to get away with this inhumane behaviour

Please sign this petition to let our government know that we will not stand for a fellow UK citzen to be treated in this manor - they must do something!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
